main event: Witnesses observed a bright silver round object in Houtzdale, Pennsylvania, that made no sound and moved slowly before disappearing.
interesting points: The object was described as being the size of a basketball held at arm's length,Multiple witnesses confirmed the object's characteristics,The object's behavior was unlike any known aircraft,The sighting was reported to authorities shortly after it occurred,Investigators classified the event as a genuine UFO sighting due to the lack of a conventional explanation.
witness description: local resident who reported seeing the object
